price: Kitaabni kuni [Rabbiin biraa ta’uu isaa keessatti] mamiin isa keessa hin jirreedha; warra Rabbiin sodaataniif qajeelfama.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبُ لَا رَيۡبَۛ فِيهِۛ هُدٗى لِّلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: dhālika al-kitābu lā rayba fīhi hudan lil'muttaqīna
